descriptionHTML:
Illustration Watch Faces 2 by VA

The popular follow-up to Illustration Watch Faces 1 by VA

Choose from four watch faces for Android Wear: "Headphones", "Scooter", "Cuda" and "Super Bee", each with unique customizations. Change colors and more using the Android Wear app!

Please note: Faces may take some time to appear on your watch and in your Android Wear app, please be patient! They WILL show up!

Add some fun illustrations to your Android Wear watch! All designs created by VA work on circular and square watches.

•  Headphones: Choose any color for the Headphones, any color for background, choose to display or hide date and / or battery.

•  Scooter: Custom pick the Scooter illustration color and background color. Choose to display or hide date and / or battery

•  Cuda: Custom pick the Cuda color, choose to display date and / or battery, and choose to turn animations on and off.

•  Super Bee: Custom pick the Super Bee color, choose to display date and / or battery, and choose to turn animations on and off.

12 and 24 hour options included with all designs.

To access the customization settings:
•  Open the Android Wear app (on the phone or tablet paired with your Wear device)
•  Select your VA Illustration watch face
•  After selected, click the gear icon over the watch face preview
•  Customize your watch face!

Add some fun and unique imagery to your Android Wear watch face!
comments: Not a fan of cars But those headphones are worth it. Please add more music-related illustrations!
Love me them Virginia's art pieces!
Pancakes. In for the headphones, stayed for the Vespa. Nice work!!
Original and beautiful Can't go wrong with these simple beauties
Get it. You won't regret it.
recentChanges: - Stand-alone version of the watch faces
